The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in England so far as at 21 January is 3,092,041 (5,493.4 cases per 100,000 population). In the seven days to 16 January, there were 272,428 new confirmed cases (484.0 new cases per 100,000). In the seven days to 09 January, there were 351,659 new cases, and so the new cases have decreased by 23% (79,231 fewer cases).
